value.name: NYPD Admits Axe Attack May Be Terrorism
value.description: raising the axe with one hand while running at police. The suspect - later identified as Zale Thompson, 32 - managed to slash one officer in his arm, and another in his head, before being shot dead.

value.name: Look at terror attacks in US, Europe, and their perpetrators

value.name: NYPD: Hatchet incident was 'a terrorist attack'
